item.title: 2025-04-26 Briefing
item.description: Discord revolutionized its search infrastructure using Kubernetes and smaller Elasticsearch clusters, enabling faster indexing of trillions of messages. Meanwhile, Microsoft restricted its C/C++ extension for VS Code to official products, impacting non-Microsoft editors. In a broader tech landscape, AI coding tools are reshaping developer workflows, while Supabase secured $200 million in funding at a $2 billion valuation. Additionally, DFloat11 compression reduces LLM sizes by 30%, and Elon Musk’s XAI is reportedly seeking $20 billion in funding. Regulatory concerns also emerged as the UK threatened Wikipedia’s tax-exempt status over foreign influence allegations.## ▶️ Internet Infrastructure
